description: Update a listener for a custom routing accelerator.

parameters.name: ListenerArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the listener to update.

parameters.name: PortRanges
parameters.description: The updated port range to support for connections from clients to your accelerator. If you remove ports that are currently being used by a subnet endpoint, the call fails. Separately, you set port ranges for endpoints. For more information, see About endpoints for custom routing accelerators. (dict) --- A complex type for a range of ports for a listener. FromPort (integer) --- The first port in the range of ports, inclusive. ToPort (integer) --- The last port in the range of ports, inclusive.

nested_params.name: FromPort
nested_params.description: The first port in the range of ports, inclusive.

nested_params.name: ToPort
nested_params.description: The last port in the range of ports, inclusive.

nested_items.name: ListenerArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the listener.

nested_items.name: PortRanges
nested_items.description: The port range to support for connections from clients to your accelerator.

nested_items.name: FromPort
nested_items.description: The first port in the range of ports, inclusive.

nested_items.name: ToPort
nested_items.description: The last port in the range of ports, inclusive.
